title: Gamification-Based Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program: G-Math Leader Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and ability to use digital devices
context.additional_context: Non-degree program for corporate managers/leaders aged 40+ aiming to develop applied mathematical skills through gamification elements

learning_goals: Learners can apply mathematical problem-solving strategies in a gamification environment with over 80% accuracy
Learners can enhance learning motivation by over 30% through game mechanics (points, badges, levels)

In 3–4 person teams, learners complete two collaborative missions (data analysis/optimization problems) over a three-week intermediate course and achieve a grade of 'B' (80–89 points) or higher in four of five evaluation criteria (problem-solving strategy, team contribution, result accuracy).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
